languages.text: "Этот потрошитель чуть не пустил нас на свои жуткие эксперименты".
"That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."
languages.original_text: "Этот потрошитель чуть не пустил нас на свои жуткие эксперименты".

traits.locale_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."
"That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."
"That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."
"That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

"That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

languages.text: 「あの屠殺者は、我々の体を恐ろしい実験に使おうとしていた」
languages.original_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

traits.locale_text: 「あの屠殺者は、我々の体を恐ろしい実験に使おうとしていた」

languages.text: “那个屠夫差点在我们身上做可怕的实验了。”
languages.original_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

traits.locale_text: “那个屠夫差点在我们身上做可怕的实验了。”

languages.text: «Ese carnicero estaba a punto de usar nuestros cuerpos para sus horribles experimentos».
languages.original_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

traits.locale_text: «Ese carnicero estaba a punto de usar nuestros cuerpos para sus horribles experimentos».

languages.text: "Dieser Schlächter stand kurz davor, unsere Körper für seine grauenhaften Experimente zu missbrauchen."
languages.original_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

traits.locale_text: "Dieser Schlächter stand kurz davor, unsere Körper für seine grauenhaften Experimente zu missbrauchen."

languages.text: « Ce boucher était à deux doigts de se servir de nos corps pour ses expériences abominables. »
languages.original_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

traits.locale_text: « Ce boucher était à deux doigts de se servir de nos corps pour ses expériences abominables. »

languages.text: "O kasap az kalsın bedenlerimizi korkunç deneylerinde kullanacaktı."
languages.original_text: "That butcher was this close to using our bodies for his horrific experiments."

traits.locale_text: "O kasap az kalsın bedenlerimizi korkunç deneylerinde kullanacaktı."
